title: Cultural Foundations of Classroom Research and Applications in Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic concepts of science education experiences and instructional design
context.additional_context: Experiences the lesson research process through VR simulations, utilizing smartphone-based collaborative tools

learning_goals: Learners analyze the cultural foundations of Lesson Study and propose strategies applicable to science education.
Learners derive improvements for lesson design through collaborative reflection with peer instructors in a simulation environment.
Learners execute a Lesson Study process reflecting cultural characteristics in a VR-based virtual classroom.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
